RelatedSentence: The visit of Azerbaijani President Ilham Aliyev to Vietnam is of historical significance , Azerbaijani Presidential Administration 's Deputy Head and Director of Administration 's Foreign Relations Department , Novruz Mammadov wrote on his Twitter page .
Mammadov also said that a grand official welcoming ceremony was held in the course of the state visit , adding that Azerbaijani delegation also visited the Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum .
